md:
giải nghĩa từ "edition" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Edition (noun) - Phiên bản, ấn bản

+ Meaning: A version of a book, magazine, or newspaper that is published at a particular time.

+ Example: The new edition of the dictionary includes many new words.

+ Related words: version, publication, printing, release

+ Antonyms: original, first edition

* Edition (noun) - Đợt phát hành, đợt xuất bản

+ Meaning: A particular number of copies of a book, magazine, or newspaper that are printed and published at the same time.

+ Example: The first edition of the book sold out quickly.

+ Related words: print run, publication, issue, batch

+ Antonyms: reprint, reissue

Note: The word "edition" can have different meanings depending on the context. In the first definition, it refers to a version of a publication, while in the second definition, it refers to a particular number of copies of a publication.
